segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the sink overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks so focused on her task, unaware of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pooling on the floor, it might damage everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children, trying to get cookies in secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool seems so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he could really get hurt, and that breaks my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting patiently, hoping for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This family moment could turn tragic so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside contrasts with the sadness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for them, caught in this unaware routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they see the risks building up?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a quiet sorrow watching potential loss.
segments.speaker: PAR
